name: Turkey Sausage Balls
author: MARJ63
summary: These turkey sausage balls are super yummy and my new favorite snack/breakfast food! Based off the recipe for pork sausage balls. Rated 5 stars based on friend and family reviews! May need to bake in 2 batches, depending on the size of your pan and sausage balls.
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine turkey sausage, Cheddar cheese, steak seasoning, and fennel seeds in a bowl
Add 1/2 of the baking mix and incorporate thoroughly by hand
Add remaining baking mix and repeat
Scoop up 1 tablespoon of mixture, form into a ball, and place on a baking sheet
Repeat with the rest of the mixture
Bake in the preheated oven until browned, 20 to 25 minutes
